text: Imagine a world where everything is decided by games. War...
politics... it's a world where you need to be good at games or you have
Heh get it , cause, its.. the shows called.. No Game..
Wow, that sounds perfect for me as a shut-in gamer who's also a genius, socially adjusted,
charismatic guy that all the ladies are gonna fall for.
Let me sit on your lap.
Did I mention she's still not related by blood, 'cause it would be totally weird if she were related by blood.
So it's a good thing she's not related by blood...
Real life sucks, would you like to switch server?
Another transporter to a fantasy worrRRRRLDD??!
Welcome to my world of games!
There are ten important rules to this world.
So make sure you listen very carefully!
Brilliant! And remember don't cheat because no one here cheats!
Except for that one time where literally everyone here cheats.
For that bag of coins, I'll bet you that amount multiplied by the number of women I've slept with.
A bag of coins times zero is still zero!
All right, are you familiar with the rules of poker?
Yeah yeah, No items, Final Destination, Fox only.
But that's over a one in six million chance!
In my world we have this thing called believing in the Heart of the Cards! (I'm Kaiba and I disagree.)
Ignore that! (In the end, Kaiba was right. Take that, Yugi!)
I'm sorry. Did you say something?
Uhhh, you keep moving your mouth, but not saying anything.
We just leave our name blank.
Can I just call you blank then?
I don't know, I feel _____ rolls off the tongue better.
THERE'S LITERALLY NOTHING TO ROLL OFF THE TONGUE!
Tasteless fanservice character! Come on in!
I'm important and useful, I'll have you know!
I'm the daughter of the former king!
All right! I'll prove it to you!
Okay. To make it easy for you, I'm gonna go rock.
*Okay, Steph. That just means don't go scissors!*
Ahahahahhaha! I can't believe that actually worked! (mental insanity)
But wait, that means you guys are actually really good.
You made me do this by applying that much mental pressure on me!
Yeah, no, you're just a fucking idiot.
I've never met someone so stupid.
Just tell me what you want.
Tell me everything you know about this world.
There are 16 total races in this world.
And our race is called "Imanity." ('Humanity', dumbass)
Why do you keep saying it like that?
What? What's wrong with what I'm saying?
Okay. What do you call one of our kind?
So what's the name of that as a whole?
You're a useless character! AND NOBODY LOVES YOU!
I challenge you to a game!
Are we doing this or not?
Allright, I'll agree as long a-
And your next line will be, "THIS MUST BE THE WORK OF AN ENEMY STAND!" (cue the JoJokes)
I'm sorry. Was that meant to be a reference of some kind?
Was that a motherfucking Persona reference?
We'll play chess for the crown.
This is fantasy chess. But it's basically like normal chess.
Basically like normal chess. Got it.
All right, I move pawn to D5.
See? The rules are just like normal che-
YOU ACTIVATED MY TRAP CARD! (yeah, just like normal chess.)
WELL I SUNK YOUR BATTLESHIP! (no, seriously.)
I ROLL NAT 20! AND CAST MAGIC MISSILE WHILE ADOPTING YOUR GOBLIN TRIBE! (...)
I ATTACK WITH MY VANGUARD, HITTING TWO CRITICAL TRIGGERS ON MY DRIVE CHECK!
I TAP MY MYR BATTLESPHERE AND DEAL 8 DAMAGE TO YOUR FACE!
Uhhhh, isn't this supposed to be chess? (what the hell else?)
Damn it! I'm in a tight spot!
Now move your last pathetic piece, Sora!
My board has no pathetic pieces!
But it does have the unstoppable Exodia!
NO ONE'S EVER BEEN ABLE TO SUMMON HIM!
OKAY! NOW WE'RE JUST STRAIGHT UP PLAYING YU-GI-OH!
I had no idea there was someone in this world this good at chess!
How about this library containing all the knowledge held in this world?
Another shameless girl to add to the harem.
Okay! Let me explain the rules of the game!
So, you say out a word and..
OKAY CAN WE STOP? I'M TRYING TO EXPL-
WILL YOU SHUT UP AND LET ME EXPLAIN THE RULES?! (screw the rules, I'm a main character.)
Is there any reason why there's so much fanservice in this show?
THIS IS A MATURE AND CLEVER SHOW!
WHAT MORE CAN WE BE MISSING?
Roll call. What do we got?
Yeah I can use a fur-
Yeah I can use a furry.
Look Shiro. There's another cute loli in this world!
The game we will play will be a virtual shooter which will commence in a week.
All right brother, what do you think we should do to win thi-
He was right here a minute ago.
NO I'M NOT TALKING ABOUT FUCKING REM!
And neither does anyone watching this!
Let's just play this FPS already!
AND NOW, IT'S THE TIME YOU'VE ALL BEEN WAITING FOR...
(not sarcasm) WOW STEPH, DID YOU FIGURE THAT OUT ALL ON YOUR OWN?!
IT'S NOT LIKE EVERYONE ELSE WE'VE PLAYED HAVE ALSO CHEATED AT THEIR GAMES!
PLEASE JUST DO SOMETHING USEFUL FOR ON-
Let's never talk about this moment ever again.
YOU DIDN'T THINK IT WOULD BE OVER ALREADY DID YOU?
Look, we're bored of this. Can we just settle this with a coin toss?
Little does he know, if I heighten my senses, I can accurately predict the side it will land on.
No, NO YOU CAN FUCK RIGHT OFF! THIS.. I.. I'M DONE... I'M DONE... I'M DONE  -door slams-
If you want to find out what happens next.
WITHOUT HAVING TO WAIT FOR A SEASON 2 THAT MAY NEVER COME

Hold up, is that the ACTUAL name of this world?
What? So this whole world is like a board game?
Hey guys hope you enjoyed that video!
